WeightedDirectedGraphAcyclic
DirectedGraphAcyclic
public
WeightedDirectedGraphAcyclic​<T>
where T : struct

Represents a weighted acyclic directed graph.

Type Parameter
T

Weight data type.

Functions

int inputCount,
int outputCount,

in ConnectionIds connIds,
LayerInfo[] layerArr,
int[] outputNodeIdxArr,
T[] weightArr

Construct with the given node counts, connection data, layer information, indexes of the output nodes, and connection weights.

Parameters
inputCount
int

Input node count.

outputCount
int

Output node count.

totalNodeCount
int

Total node count.

connIds
in ConnectionIds

The connection source and target node IDs.

layerArr
LayerInfo[]

Layer information for the acyclic graph.

outputNodeIdxArr
int[]

An array containing the node index of each output node.

weightArr
T[]

Connection weights array.
